title: The Second Life of an Idol - Novel Updates
tags: Celebrities   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Reincarnation   Second Chance   Showbiz   Singers   Time Travel
author: 라인히어
description:
Meet Do Shi-Yoon, someone who has spent eight years as an idol.

In this life, he has debuted as a new man, doing everything from composing to promoting all alone.

“A debut? I’ll do it myself.”>
